nascent: We have not yet identified the stakeholders that our Impact Management Capability needs to serve.
emerging: We have identified internal and/or external stakeholders that will be impacted by our Impact Management Capability.
expanding: We are refining our identified stakeholders based on engagements with internal stakeholders.
optimising: We are refining our stakeholder maps and/or engagement strategies based on learnings through implementing Impact Management and Measurement.
mature: We know how to serve the needs of our identified Impact Management Capability stakeholders.
